name: Halcyon's Ascent
flavorText: "Raise your weapon, raise your weapon... and it's over." —Halcyon
flavorTextHtml: "Raise your weapon, raise your weapon... and it's over." —Halcyon

oneOf.textHtml: When you use Akarat's Champion, you mesmerize nearby enemies with your skill, causing them to jump uncontrollably for [6 - 8] seconds.
oneOf.text: When you use Akarat's Champion, you mesmerize nearby enemies with your skill, causing them to jump uncontrollably for [6 - 8] seconds.
